item.title: UGC videos for product video ads (girls) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a UGC content creator to produce high-quality video ads (each of under 60 seconds) for 4 products in the skin care and wellness industry. Products like face serum, face mask, breast oil, Weight gainer, libido booster,  bum and back cream. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, editing, and delivering engaging video content that highlights the benefits and features of our products. This role requires a strong understanding of UGC trends and the ability to create content that resonates with our target audience.

    Key skills:
    - Video production
    - Video editing
    - Storyboarding
    - Content ideation
    - Creative direction
    - Knowledge of skin care and wellness industry

    Time frame: Under 60 Second


Budget: $50

item.title: Pro video editor - Upwork
item.description:
📢We're hiring at ContentJet.io!

💻 Video Editors: Apps, Games, & Lead Gen

📅Monday to Friday, 9:30 am to 5:30 pm EST. (Remote)

🚀1. Who are we?

We are ContentJet, a creative agency specialized in producing highly effective video ads for social media and user-generated content.

🎥2. Who are we hiring?
We're looking to hire video editors for a full-time position at ContentJet to create a minimum of 3 ads per day (Monday to Friday).

The video ads created by this editor will fall into the following categories:
                   ⬤Apps ⬤ Games ⬤ Websites ⬤ Lead Generation

📌3. Required Skills:

✒️Graphic and editing skills (Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro, CapCut or similar programs, as well as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Canva, or any related Graphic Design program, and knowledge of basic and advanced video editing techniques). Ideally, you should have extensive experience with creating and incorporating high-quality motion graphics into videos.

✏️Narrative skills (Ability to create compliant and engaging scripts). A solid understanding of timing and rhythm in video editing is important to create a captivating viewing experience.

💡Creativity and innovation (Willingness to experiment with different formats, effects, and styles to find what resonates best with the target audience).

👩‍💻👨‍💻Adaptability (including the ability to quickly adapt to changing trends and keep up with the evolving nature of TikTok content).

KEY: 🔍👁Attention to detail (Video quality, color, and overall aesthetics, to ensure excellent visual and professional quality in all videos).

🗣Collaboration and communication (Effective communication skills to work closely with operations teams, creative directors, and other video editors in the creative process).

✋Honesty and responsibility.

🕓Organization and time management skills.

➡️Fluent in English.

4. 🎬Example videos

You will be assigned projects in these editing styles: Apps Games, & Lead Gen
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/114vcFLT3YehtnQ0_uDxB9f9DjOIrAz5J?usp=sharing


Additionally, we need you to have experience editing videos in this style: Search Arb
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1CrpVSfF40nIWlvuQTucCMzWCUvyVXEqC

💲5. Compensation
$850 per month: 3 approved videos per day.
$1000 per month: 4+ approved videos per day.
$1200 per month: 4+ approved videos per day (must have less than 30% of videos going for revision).

📌 At the moment, we are only hiring editors located in Latin America.

📝6. Questions to answer to be considered:

   👉 What are your strengths and weaknesses?
   👉 Describe yourself in 2 words.
   👉 What makes you stand out as a video editor?
   👉 Why should we hire you?

    📝📁If your qualifications align with the requirements mentioned above,  submit your portfolio (Google Drive link, containing relevant work only), along with your responses to our questions. Additionally, initiate your application by affirming, "I agree with everything mentioned in the post," to be considered.

⚠️Only candidates with experience in full-time positions and portfolios featuring comparable videos to the ones provided by us should apply.

    ☝️Those who successfully meet the pre-qualification criteria will be contacted to proceed with the next phase.

  Thank you very much!⭐

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: June 26, 2024 14:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, AI-Generated Video, Corporate Video, Gaming Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, AI-Generated Video, Corporate Video, Gaming Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Create 1-2 Minute Video Reviews of Amazon Products You Already Own - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking reliable and creative individuals to produce faceless video reviews of various Amazon products they already own. The ideal candidate will have access to a range of products, particularly in categories such as kitchen appliances/tools, vacuums, kids toys, yard equipment, recreation equipment, etc.

Responsibilities:
-Create high-quality faceless video reviews of Amazon products, ranging from 1 to 3 minutes in length.
-Ensure that the video showcases the product features and provides a clear understanding of how to use it.
-Familiarize yourself with the product details by reviewing Amazon product highlights and descriptions.
-Maintain excellent video quality to enhance the overall viewing experience


Requirements:
1. Each product featured should have a value of more than $25 on Amazon.
2. No food, clothing, medicines, or beauty products.
2. Submit the amazon link to the product along with the video review
3. Commitment to delivering high-quality video content

The audio does not need to be perfect in the video as it's going to be extracted and voiced-over.  However, you will still need to speak so we can follow a timeline and your guide to do the voiceover of the product features/how to use.

We are looking for 20 videos -$3 a video. These are faceless reviews with the audio voiced-over, so they shouldn't take long to complete.


Budget: $60
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:58 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Skills: Testimonial Video, Explainer Video, Video Production, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Content Video Editor and Thumbnail Designer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled YouTube Content Video Editor and Thumbnail Designer to join our team. The ideal candidate will produce high-quality videos and captivating thumbnails, aligning with our brand's style.

Responsibilities:
- Edit YouTube videos, adding music, sound effects, graphics, and more.
- Design eye-catching thumbnails to maximize viewer engagement.
- Review this YouTube Channel to ensure you meet our quality standards: https://www.youtube.com/@ChawanneBurns/videos
- Collaborate with our team to understand video and thumbnail requirements.
- Work directly with the client to ensure all content aligns with their vision.
-Manage time effectively to meet deadlines.

Requirements:
- Experience in video editing and thumbnail design.
- Proficiency with video and graphic design software.
- A portfolio showcasing your work.
- Strong attention to detail and creativity.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Compensation:
$50 per video edit and thumbnail
(While this rate is modest, it offers consistent work, portfolio expansion, and collaboration with a growing channel)

Application Instructions:
- Review the provided YouTube channel to ensure you can meet our editing standards.
- If you've read this far, include the keyword "STARTER" as the first word in your cover letter.
- Submit your portfolio showcasing both video editing and thumbnail design work.

Note: This job is for both Video Editing and Thumbnail Design. Please do not apply if you only specialize in one area.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, YouTube, Photo Editing, Video Production
Skills: YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, YouTube, Photo Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Seeking Freelance Video Editor for Subtitling and AI Voice Modification - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am looking for an experienced freelance video editor to join our project team. We need someone skilled in video editing, subtitling, and voice modification using AI technology.

Responsibilities:

Edit video content to match our specifications and quality standards.
Add accurate subtitles to videos in English.
Modify voice tracks using AI tools to enhance clarity and quality, or to alter voice characteristics as required by the project.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing and subtitling.
Familiarity with AI voice modification tools and techniques.
Ability to work within deadlines and adhere to creative directions.
Strong attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work.
Project Details:

Duration: 3 months with a possibility of extension.
Workload: Part-time, flexible hours.
Location: Remote.
If you are interested and meet the above qualifications, please submit your resume, portfolio showcasing your video editing and subtitling work, and any examples of AI voice modification projects. We are looking forward to working with you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, English, Audio Editing, AI Audio Generator
Skills: AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, English, Audio Editing, AI Audio Generator
Country: France

item.title: Looking for Brazilian UGC - Upwork
item.description:
hello! I am Cherrie and I am interested in creating user-generated content (UGC) videos for our upcoming ad campaigns. Before that, there are some specific details I would like to discuss:

1. Cost to Produce UGC Video: Could you please provide information on the cost associated with producing a UGC video? We are looking for high-quality content that resonates with our target audience.

2. Number of Videos per Request: How many UGC videos can you provide per request? We anticipate needing a consistent stream of content for our various marketing channels.

3. Fluency in Brazilian Portuguese: Our target market includes Brazilian audiences, so it’s essential that the UGC creators are fluent in Brazilian Portuguese. Can you confirm that your creators meet this requirement?

4. Provide script writing service.

We appreciate your prompt response and look forward to exploring a potential collaboration and price is negotiable.

Please feel free to share any additional details or portfolio samples.

Thank you!

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:37 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Demo Video, Testimonial Video, Promotional Video, Compositing, Brazilian Portuguese Dialect, Content Writing, English, Translation, Writing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Demo Video, Testimonial Video, Promotional Video, Compositing, Brazilian Portuguese Dialect, Content Writing, English, Translation, Writing
Country: Malaysia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Youtube Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for someone to edit our long form videos and turn them into shorts. This person will have access to our YouTube channel and upload videos on set intervals. This person should know when the right intervals are to gain YouTube traction.

It would be helpful if you could do keyword research in our field, look at competitors, and come up with new titles of videos for us to make videos on.

We're Medicare insurance company and do Medicare related videos.

item.title: Medium & Short Social Post Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
If you are looking for a fun way to encourage and challenge others through engaging social media content; to be a catalyst to reorient people to the Creator of the Universe and help them take responsibility for their relationship with God and the people He places around them; to do the work of the ministry, making disciples of all nations, evangelizing to the world, we have the perfect opportunity for you.

Our ministry needs to edit 21 videos a week. This is a combination of shorts, medium, and long form content. Captioning is required with proper English grammar and active word highlight is preferred. SRT/VTT files for captions are a must.

We will provide our Brand Standards document for colors, fonts, and general guidelines. Keyword, Hashtags, Titles, and Descriptions would be extremely beneficial. AI edited clips will not be accepted or paid for. Limited AI B-roll content is acceptable with rights to redistribute.

All editing must be in Premier Pro and must provide the Premier Pro files and have license to redistribute additional content (B-roll, effects, music) used in the videos.

We shoot using 3 different cameras and as much as we try to control lighting, it is different on all three so you must be good at color matching.

- Shorts must be edited to fit all short form platforms in 9:16 aspect ratio, splicing content to be the most engaging form. Our ideal video length is 25-37 seconds. This will be the bulk of the work as we are posting 15 - 18 shorts per week.

Pulling short content from the medium and long form content will be required and will count towards the 15-18 short videos. Cliff hangers should be created to create a desire to click on the associated medium and long form content.

- Medium Content will need to fit platform requirements such as YT, Rumble, FB in 16:9 aspect ratio. Editing pauses and stumbles is required, but since video content is longer, less editing is needed on these videos.

- Long Form Content. These are typically single camera podcast shots at the moment. We would like to change that up to get other shots as well but being that we want them to represent a live unedited format, the amount of editing on these is very little.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Promotional Video, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Promotional Video, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - vlogs, interviews, dating tips, travel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, I'm a dating/lifecoach and entrepreneur looking for a skilled and driven YouTube video editor who can help my channel grow long-term.

My channel: https://www.youtube.com/@stephenchoi

My channel explores a variety of themes, including dating, relationships, building my coaching business, conversations with clients, and experiences as a nomadic entrepreneur.

In terms of schedule, I'm looking to post at least 1 long-form video a week.

So far, I've mainly been doing talking head style videos, and I'm looking to also post street/indoor interviews and vlogs.

For talking head videos, I’m looking to replicate the style of my most recent video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8pToXAT-6QQ

It’ll be great to add the editor’s unique creative touch.

For the selection process, potential candidates will be asked to create a quick long-form video.

If hired, your responsibilities will include:

1. Editing A-roll footage to emphasize the most engaging segments.
2. Creating a compelling hook in the first 5-10 seconds to captivate viewers.
3. Integrating strategic B-roll and maintaining a lively pace to keep the audience engaged throughout.
4. Selecting appropriate royalty-free background music.
5. Utilizing your color grading skills for a professional finish (if applicable).
6. Producing 1-5 impactful YouTube Shorts (up to 1 minute each) from key moments in the full-length video.
7. (For interview videos), chopping the long-form and turning it into most impactful short-form videos

If you're interested, please send your portfolio along with your top work samples that align with my channel's content and highlight your video editing skills.

Looking forward!

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Video Intro & Outro, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Sound Design
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Video Intro & Outro, Color Grading, Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Sound Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Recruiting Talented Video Editors - Upwork
item.description:
🔔 Intro:

Hello, thanks for looking at my post. My name’s Heri and we're looking for high-quality, reliable, and responsive video editors interested in working in a fully remote social media management agency.

We’re not a new agency; we've been around for almost three years. Previous candidates I’ve hired from sites like Upwork have received promotions and pay raises after consistently good job performance.

🔔 Preferences

Candidates who implement social media video best practices, such as attention-grabbing thumbnails and transitions that match audio and/or use trending sounds, will also receive priority.

Don't worry if you don't know that because full training will also be provided.


🔔 Requirements:

✅Be able to write at a professional English level

✅Work for yourself and not a company or agency

✅Comfortable using Adobe Premier Pro and Aftereffects or equivalent

✅Coachable and willing to learn and improve

✅Creative and able to think of solutions independently

✅Ability to implement visual effects, colour grading, transitions & sound effects


🔔 Compensation:

💰Compensation ranges from $5 - $20 per video, depending on the complexity/length.

💰We will also provide a one-off bonus of $100 if you provide a great service and our client stays beyond 6 months 😎 (which happens quite often!)

💰There are also ad-hoc opportunities for one-off bonuses I.E $10 to create a sample post for a potential new client

🔔 Benefits for you:

🚀100% remote working, we don't care where you're as long as you get the work done :)

🚀An experienced line manager who'll be on hand to support you in delivering results for your client

🚀Bonuses to reward good performance

🚀Career growth opportunities, several people we've hired have been with us for nearly 2 years and have received promotions. Others have also happily referred their friends to us too.

🔔 Our Clients

We have a very varied portfolio of existing clients ranging from Real Estate, Apps, E-commerce, Professional services and Personal Brands who we provide social media management services to.

🔔 To Apply:

Message me with a brief overview of what makes you a good fit for this role. Please start your message with “Apavale” (my agency name) so I know you read the full job description.

🔔 Deadline:

Saturday June 29th

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Intro & Outro
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for cosmetics product advertising - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there!

We're a creative video marketing agency specialising in cosmetics, skincare, and supplements advertising. We shoot products in our studio and are looking for remote video editors to help deliver exciting and creative commercial video to our clients.

We are looking for video editor(s) with experience in the commercial space (any type of commercial) who have talents in colour grading footage, plus using visual effects to enhance the product videos. Please share examples from your portfolio.

We deliver a basic storyboard and download links to footage on our server which the editors are expected to download and evaluate the takes themselves (poor takes are excluded from the server). Videos are 15-60 second product advertisements for social media, client websites, and events. Videos should also include music and audio where appropriate.

Editors with experience in this space will be preferred and those with skills in Davinci Resolve fusion or similar will be preferred.

We are looking to hire on a per-job basis immediately (we have projects ready to go right now).

You will be expected to provide revisions and accept feedback to initial video submissions. Working quickly and efficiently is highly valued. Delivery within 5-7 days including revisions is ideal.

ALL APPLICANTS WHO HAVE READ THE DESCRIPTION PLEASE WRITE ***I HAVE READ YOUR DESCRIPTION!*** AT THE TOP OF YOUR PROPOSAL! Any proposals without this will be immediately discarded :)

Any questions about this job please let me know!

Best,
Rhys

XWZ Media

Hourly Range: $18.00-$42.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Audio Editing, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Audio Editing, Color Grading, Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Sport Offroad video editing - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to work on my new project - a motorcycle offroad contest video. The ideal candidate should have experience in live-action video, 360-degree video editing, audio editing, video editing, and video production.

There'll be 3 videos, one for each route:
- Elefantentreffen
- Sterrare è Umano Trophy
- 1000 Sassi

The video editor will be responsible for editing raw footage of off-road racing, adding music and sound effects, and creating a visually stunning video that showcases the thrill and excitement of the sport. The final video should be a blend of action, adventure, fun and adrenaline.

We are looking for a candidate who is passionate about video editing and has a keen eye for detail. The candidate should be able to work independently and deliver high-quality work within the given timeframe.

The budget shown is not the real budget.
If you are interested in this project, please submit a proposal with fixed price for the 3 videos, detailing your experience in video editing and how you can contribute to this project. Please include links to your past completed projects to showcase your skills and expertise.

You can check previous videos here: https://www.youtube.com/@jabbo88/videos

You can download all files from the following links:

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/i6m9l03bmyxcxayl1pmoe/AKfkofFHM5Y1XpsWbYillc0?rlkey=8o2vx095nnlm3x7rahte6vq2x&dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/zdtstupz865mm6j2pfuf1/ADOdzuTeAD4M1gsJDSlpdZU?rlkey=tskfx27rplvoeu4w4ap6sejpk&dl=0

Budget: $99

Skills: Live Action Video, 360-Degree Video Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Audio Editing

item.title: Thumbnail artist - Upwork
item.description:
n search of a professional and experienced thumbnail artist, producing high quality thumbnails,

*Please read this carefully before applying for this job.*

The ideal candidate/team will have worked on YouTube automation channels before with measurable success, have extensive knowledge of Youtube guidelines/copyright rules/fair use policies, strong photoshop skills and access to Stock Footage sites.

We Want to Work With You If:
- You have experience in creating highly engaging and clickbait thumbnails.
- You understand psychology behind thumbnails
- You can analyze competition and their thumbnails & create your own best version
- You understand how to draw viewers in with an interesting thumbnail.
- You have experience working under tight deadlines
- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions.
- You are organized, communicative and have fast turnaround times.
- You can deliver items via (Google Drive/Monday.com/Trello)

Why we are awesome to work with:
- You'll fill your portfolio with a variety of professional thumbnail samples
- We have high-quality standards, which means awesome training – you'll learn a ton
- Work from wherever you want (as long as we can reach you)
- There is PLENTY of work to go around, and no cap on what you can create
- We recognize talent and promote from within
- Kickass bonuses and incentives

Job requirements:
- 2 thumbnails per week
- $10 per thumbnail

Priority given to the video editor that best matches the Job Description. Budget is $5 per video, negotiable for higher pay for **proven work of high quality and results based track record**.

Please send current portfolio/sample work for review.



Posted On: June 26, 2024 13:17 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Sports & Recreation, Informational Infographic, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: Sports & Recreation, Informational Infographic, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, Graphic Design

The ideal candidate/team will have worked on YouTube automation channels before with measurable success, have extensive knowledge of Youtube guidelines/copyright rules/fair use policies, strong photoshop skills and access to Stock Footage sites.

We Want to Work With You If:
- You have experience in creating highly engaging and clickbait thumbnails.
- You understand psychology behind thumbnails
- You can analyze competition and their thumbnails & create your own best version
- You understand how to draw viewers in with an interesting thumbnail.
- You have experience working under tight deadlines
- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions.
- You are organized, communicative and have fast turnaround times.
- You can deliver items via (Google Drive/Monday.com/Trello)

Why we are awesome to work with:
- You'll fill your portfolio with a variety of professional thumbnail samples
- We have high-quality standards, which means awesome training – you'll learn a ton
- Work from wherever you want (as long as we can reach you)
- There is PLENTY of work to go around, and no cap on what you can create
- We recognize talent and promote from within
- Kickass bonuses and incentives

Job requirements:
- 2 thumbnails per week
- $10 per thumbnail

Priority given to the video editor that best matches the Job Description. Budget is $5 per video, negotiable for higher pay for **proven work of high quality and results based track record**.

Please send current portfolio/sample work for review.

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for mega project construction YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

We are a YouTube Automation company and we are looking for a talented, hard-working, and experienced video editor to join our team.

We are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in video editing for the Construction / Mega Project Niche, similar channel to this channel:

B1M - https://www.youtube.com/@TheB1M/videos

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and eventually, if we are a good fit we would also have the full- time/retainer opportunity.

Please only apply if you already work on other YouTube Channels.

Looking forward to working with you!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
